relproducts.title: Demoiselle Mist Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Giant dragonflies lend their grace and poise to this cool blue demoiselle roman blind, seeming to fly big and bold in tight formation across an icy sky. Its a cooling look, bringing calm and class to a space that needs a modern edge, a stunning example of harlequin style.
